name: Boston to Paris - Kuiper Sync
description:
Boston <-> Paris via Kuiper constellation
34 orbits à 34 satellites = 1156 satellites, 630km height, 51.9° orbit inclination, 4 ISL links
100 ground stations with 10,000 background traffic flows
50Mbps GSL and ISL link capacities
Extra Feature: 1000ms transmission stop at 15-second reconfiguration intervals
